attributes.action: Grant The Celtic Nation of Cornwall (Kernow) Independance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Ireland now a flourishing  independant republic and both Scotland and Wales now having succesful National Assemblies,its time for Cornwall to be recognized as on of the other six Celtic Nations and given its own Independance and freedom from Imperial foreign rule.With its own language,traditions and culture its considered the 'Cinderella' of the Celtic nations because of its imprisoned beauty.FREE KERNOW SIGN THIS PETITION.
